item.title: Blocked drainage, 18th December
item.description:
I could copy/paste from previous tickets. Drain outside 13 Vineyard street is not working. Please do not close this ticket if this is not looked at. For at least the past year it has been like this because this has not been cleaned since my first report

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vineyard Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain now blocked nd rod is flooded, 18th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 18th December
item.description:
Appears to be a blocked Culvert or Gulley, water however is flowing very heavily out of the asset. Can this please be passed on to the relevant AHR for further investigation as to the cause of the water. This is causing an issue with a constant stream of water across the A435 Cirencester Road.
Report on FixMyStreet
